name: Analytical
desc: Breaks problems into parts and reasons with data and logic.

name: Adaptable
desc: Adjusts quickly to change and new information.

name: Visionary
desc: Sees future possibilities and paints a compelling picture.

name: Teacher
desc: Explains concepts clearly and helps others learn.

name: Mentor
desc: Guides, supports, and develops others over time.

name: Compassionate
desc: Responds with empathy and care for people.

name: Creative
desc: Generates novel ideas and connects unexpected dots.

name: Detail-Oriented
desc: Catches small discrepancies; cares about precision.

name: Strategic
desc: Thinks several steps ahead to reach long-term goals.

name: Resilient
desc: Bounces back from setbacks and keeps moving.

name: Collaborative
desc: Works well with others; values diverse input.

name: Innovative
desc: Improves systems; tries new approaches that work.

name: Disciplined
desc: Follows through consistently; keeps commitments.

name: Servant-Leader
desc: Leads by serving the team and removing obstacles.

name: Organizer
desc: Brings order, plans resources, and sequences tasks.

name: Communicator
desc: Conveys ideas clearly in writing and speech.

name: Problem Solver
desc: Finds practical solutions under constraints.

name: Researcher
desc: Digs for facts and patterns to inform decisions.

name: Builder
desc: Creates usable things—products, programs, or processes.

name: Entrepreneurial
desc: Spots opportunities and takes initiative.

name: Reliable
desc: Delivers on time and can be counted on.

name: Curious
desc: Asks questions, explores, and learns quickly.

name: Empathetic
desc: Understands others’ feelings and perspectives.

name: Courageous
desc: Takes wise risks; speaks up for what’s right.

name: Ethical
desc: Acts with integrity; chooses the right path.

name: Patient
desc: Gives things time; steady under pressure.

name: Facilitator
desc: Guides groups to decisions and alignment.

name: Planner
desc: Maps steps, timelines, and resources clearly.

name: Connector
desc: Introduces people and creates partnerships.

name: Coach
desc: Helps others improve with feedback and encouragement.

name: Listener
desc: Hears beyond words; reflects back understanding.

name: Results-Driven
desc: Focuses on outcomes and measurable impact.

name: Calm Under Pressure
desc: Stays steady and clear in high-stakes moments.

name: Data-Driven
desc: Uses evidence to guide choices and priorities.

name: Systems Thinker
desc: Understands how parts fit within a whole.

name: Hands-On
desc: Learns by doing; rolls up sleeves to help.

name: Growth Mindset
desc: Believes abilities grow with practice and feedback.

name: Resourceful
desc: Finds a way forward with what’s available.

name: Quality-Focused
desc: Raises the bar; cares about craftsmanship.

name: Customer-Obsessed
desc: Puts user needs at the center of decisions.

name: Design Thinker
desc: Empathizes, prototypes, and iterates to fit users.

name: Storyteller
desc: Frames facts as narratives that move people.

name: Operator
desc: Runs day-to-day smoothly and reliably.

name: Strategist
desc: Chooses where to play and how to win.

name: Learner
desc: Pursues knowledge and builds skills continuously.

name: Self-Starter
desc: Motivated to begin and keep momentum without prompts.

name: Owner’s Mindset
desc: Thinks like an owner; accountable for outcomes.

name: Process-Focused
desc: Creates repeatable steps that reduce errors.

name: Innovative Executor
desc: Turns new ideas into shipped results.

name: Persuasive
desc: Influences decisions through logic and credibility.
